name: Block Swap
summary:
Block Swap is a simple but challenging puzzle game. 
 
Swap blocks to move them around the board and sort each level by color. 
 
Play through 600 colorful levels over 6 different grid sizes. 
 
Solve each level within the maximum amount of moves allowed to get 1 star and unlock the next level. Get 3 stars by sorting each level in the fewest amount of moves possible. 
 
Switch the game to dark mode to ease your eyes while playing. 
 
Featuring simple controls, clean UI, and plenty of fun & addicting levels to play in your free time!
